item.title: Welcome to PyTips
item.description: Data Analysis and Programming with Python Programming Language This workshop website is developed and maintained by Dr.Â Priyanga D. Talagala This hands-on workshop aims to equip participants with the fundamentals of programming in Python and give them skills needed to apply data analysis approaches to their research questions. The workshop will be taught in a similar style to Data Carpentry workshops. Data Carpentryâ€™s mission is to train researchers in the core data skills for efficient, shareable, and reproducible research practices.
